main.title: BUYING WITH US IS PROFITABLE AND SAFE
main.subtitle: GET ALL SERVICES IN 1 PACKAGE
main.spare_parts: Ordering original car spare parts from USA, Dubai and Russia
main.repair: Quick organization of the car repair process
main.car_selection: Individual approach to car selection, pricing and other costs by our experienced specialists
main.deposit_payment: In the amount of 15% of the planned auction price, but not less than AMD 500,000. The deposit is refundable until the car is purchased
main.car_history: Before participating in the auction, your manager will check the history of the preferred car (autocheck, carfax)
main.auction_participation: We participate in the auction in your presence or online and buy the car at the planned price
main.contract_signing: Where is the final price of the car fixed in RA, the 3 stages of payment, the rights and responsibilities of the parties
main.inland_transportation: The car is transported from the auction to the appropriate port, additional photos of the car are provided upon arrival.
main.insurance: Shipping insurance is provided through leading local insurance companies based on port drawings
main.sea_freight: The car is loaded into a container, with the help of a special number you can track the movement of your property
main.customs_clearance: In the presence of our specialists, the car is unloaded from the container and cleared through customs through our brokerage organization
main.credit: Purchase the car on credit before arriving in Armenia
main.refund: Return of the car if desired, without any penalty or fine
main.delivery: The already cleared car is handed over to you based on the sales contract

calc.title: Below calculator allows you to count the auction fee, shipping, insurance and customs clearance according to the 2020 EEC tariffs.

print.col_1: Within 1(one) day after buying the vehicle
print.col_2: Within 45 (forty five) days after signing the Agreement
print.col_3: Within 3 (three) days, after receiving notification about the import of the vehicle
